name: Pokémon Bidoof Version
overview: omething weird has happened in Kanto! The Pokemon have all been replaced by... Bidoofs?!? Explore a world you never asked for, but are getting anyway! Features • Your starter is Bidoof • Your rival uses Bidoof • All the gyms use Bidoof • The legendaries are Bidoof • All buildings are shaped like Bidoof • Your hat is Bidoof • Your father is Bidoof
